content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_restricted_shell_20260128/TLVCodec is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
The user wants me to migrate a Java project from Java 8 to Java 17. Let me start by exploring the project structure to understand what we're working with.

1. First, I'll view the project directory to see what files are present
2. Check the pom.xml to see the current Java version and dependencies
3. Update the pom.xml to use Java 17
4. Update dependencies to versions compatible with Java 17
5. Run mvn clean verify to check if it works
6. Fix any issues that arise

Let's start!

File content displayed in console.
Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>com.dream.codec</groupId>
    <artifactId>tlv-parent</artifactId>
    <version>2.0.0</version>
    <packaging>pom</packaging>

    <url>https://github.com/DreamJM/TLVCodec</url>

    <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <project.reporting.outputEncoding>UTF-8</project.reporting.outputEncoding>
        <maven.compiler.source>1.8</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>1.8</maven.compiler.target>
        <maven.compiler.compilerVersion>1.8</maven.compiler.compilerVersion>
        <spring.boot.version>2.2.4.RELEASE</spring.boot.version>
        <guava.version>29.0-jre</guava.version>
        <junit5.version>5.6.0</junit5.version>
    </properties>

    <distributionManagement>
        <site>
            <id>${project.artifactId}-site</id>
            <url>file://./</url>
        </site>
    </distributionManagement>

    <modules>
        <module>tlv</module>
        <module>tlv-spring-boot-starter</module>
        <module>tlv-spring</module>
    </modules>

    <dependencyManagement>
        <dependencies>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>com.google.guava</groupId>
                <artifactId>guava</artifactId>
                <version>${guava.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
                <artifactId>junit-jupiter-api</artifactId>
                <version>${junit5.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
                <artifactId>spring-boot-dependencies</artifactId>
                <version>${spring.boot.version}</version>
                <type>pom</type>
                <scope>import</scope>
            </dependency>
        </dependencies>
    </dependencyManagement>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>com.github.spotbugs</groupId>
                <artifactId>spotbugs-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
        <pluginManagement>
            <plugins>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.0.0-M4</version>
                    <dependencies>
                        <dependency>
                            <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
                            <artifactId>junit-jupiter-engine</artifactId>
                            <version>5.6.0</version>
                        </dependency>
                    </dependencies>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.1.1</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <encoding>UTF-8</encoding>
                        <charset>UTF-8</charset>
                        <docencoding>UTF-8</docencoding>
                    </configuration>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <id>attach-javadocs</id>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>jar</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.2.1</version>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <id>attach-sources</id>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>jar</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>
                <!-- spotbugs plugin: 1. mvn spotbugs:spotbugs to generate report 2. mvn spotbugs:gui to show results -->
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>com.github.spotbugs</groupId>
                    <artifactId>spotbugs-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.1.12.2</version>
                    <dependencies>
                        <dependency>
                            <groupId>com.github.spotbugs</groupId>
                            <artifactId>spotbugs</artifactId>
                            <version>4.0.0-RC3</version>
                        </dependency>
                    </dependencies>
                    <configuration>
                        <outputEncoding>UTF-8</outputEncoding>
                        <sourceEncoding>UTF-8</sourceEncoding>
                        <xmlOutput>true</xmlOutput>
                        <omitVisitors>FindReturnRef</omitVisitors>
                        <plugins>
                            <plugin>
                                <groupId>com.h3xstream.findsecbugs</groupId>
                                <artifactId>findsecbugs-plugin</artifactId>
                                <version>1.10.1</version>
                            </plugin>
                            <plugin>
                                <groupId>com.mebigfatguy.fb-contrib</groupId>
                                <artifactId>fb-contrib</artifactId>
                                <version>7.4.3.sb</version>
                            </plugin>
                        </plugins>
                    </configuration>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                    <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>0.8.5</version>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <id>jacoco-prepare</id>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                        <execution>
                            <id>jacoco-report</id>
                            <phase>test</phase>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>report</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-project-info-reports-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.0.0</version>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-site-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.8.2</version>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <id>site-stage</id>
                            <phase>site</phase>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>stage</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>
            </plugins>
        </pluginManagement>
    </build>

    <reporting>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>com.github.spotbugs</groupId>
                <artifactId>spotbugs-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <reportSets>
                    <reportSet>
                        <reports>
                            <report>report</report>
                        </reports>
                    </reportSet>
                </reportSets>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </reporting>
</project>

There's a JUnit issue. We need to add the junit-platform-launcher dependency. Let me also check for the deprecated API warnings and fix those. Let me first see the ContentDecoder file:
Now let's fix the deprecated constructors by using valueOf methods instead:

Perfect! The Java 8 to Java 17 migration is complete and successful. Let me create a summary of all the changes made:

## Migration Summary

The TLVCodec project has been successfully migrated from Java 8 to Java 17. Here are the key changes:

### 1. **Updated Java Version in Parent POM** (`pom.xml`)
- Changed `maven.compiler.source` from `1.8` to `17`
- Changed `maven.compiler.target` from `1.8` to `17`
- Changed `maven.compiler.compilerVersion` from `1.8` to `17`

### 2. **Updated Dependencies**
- **Spring Boot**: `2.2.4.RELEASE` → `3.2.1`
- **Guava**: `29.0-jre` → `33.0.0-jre`
- **JUnit 5**: `5.6.0` → `5.10.1`
- **JUnit Platform Launcher**: Added version `1.10.1` (required for Java 17)

### 3. **Updated Maven Plugins**
- **maven-surefire-plugin**: `3.0.0-M4` → `3.2.3`
- **maven-javadoc-plugin**: `3.1.1` → `3.6.3` (added `<source>17</source>` configuration)
- **maven-source-plugin**: `3.2.1` → `3.3.0`
- **spotbugs-maven-plugin**: `3.1.12.2` → `4.8.3.0`
- **spotbugs**: `4.0.0-RC3` → `4.8.3`
- **findsecbugs-plugin**: `1.10.1` → `1.13.0`
- **fb-contrib**: `7.4.3.sb` → `7.6.4`
- **jacoco-maven-plugin**: `0.8.5` → `0.8.11`
- **maven-project-info-reports-plugin**: `3.0.0` → `3.5.0`
- **maven-site-plugin**: `3.8.2` → `3.12.1`

### 4. **Added Test Dependencies**
Added to all module POMs (`tlv/pom.xml`, `tlv-spring/pom.xml`):
- `junit-jupiter-engine` (test scope)
- `junit-platform-launcher` (test scope)

### 5. **Fixed Deprecated API Usage**
In `ContentDecoder.java`, replaced deprecated constructors with `valueOf()` methods:
- `new Byte()` → `Byte.valueOf()`
- `new Short()` → `Short.valueOf()`
- `new Integer()` → `Integer.valueOf()`
- `new Long()` → `Long.valueOf()`

### Build Verification
✅ All modules compile successfully with Java 17
✅ All tests pass (1 test in tlv module)
✅ `mvn clean verify` completes successfully
✅ No compilation errors
✅ Only minor Javadoc warnings (missing comments) which don't affect the build
